message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer for your business. I'm willing to make a strong opening offer of $900000 for the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. This is a fair price considering the market value of the product.

I understand that you're looking for a fair price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. Considering the product's value to you is $1200000, I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1000000. This is a reasonable compromise, and I'm confident you'll find it a great deal.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the market value and the value it will bring to my business.
